Admiral.Title: Martok
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, gain +1 attack die and roll -2 defense dice this round. You may convert 1 of your [HIT] results into a [CRIT] result.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, gain +1 attack die and roll -2 defense dice this round. You may convert 1 of your [HIT] results into a [CRIT] result.
